narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Community Health Systems Inc. is a Clinic/Center  Federally Qualified Health Center (FQHC) provider based in Riverside, CA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $51.3M in Medicaid payments across 581K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $51.3M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
